title: Elven Silver: The Irreverent Faery Tales of Zardoa Silverstar
description: "Elven Silver" is a collection of short stories by Zardoa Silverstar, one of the Silver Elves. You will find within these pages a western, a detective story, parodies of popular movie and television characters, and re-imaginings of traditional fairy tales all told from an elven point of view in Zardoa's wry irreverent pixie style. We hope you enjoy them as much as we do.
author: The Silver Elves
